pageTitle: Oyster pay as you go credit no longer needed
description: How to get a refund if you no longer need your pay as you go Oyster credit.

breadcrumbs.title: Oyster pay as you go credit no longer needed

title.title: Oyster pay as you go credit no longer needed

texts: If your remaining credit is Â£10 or less, you can get a refund for the credit, and any deposit, from a Tube station ticket machine.
You Oyster card will be cancelled when we process this refund.
